Posts.Content: May 4, 2015 11:16PM CandynKiss wrote: Hi all, thank you all for sharing, I'm 10 weeks out from my last chemo (i had 4 AC and 4 Taxotere) and currently have what i call male pattern baldness. Hair coming in at the temples so that at least it is noticeable, and on top and in back very thin. Most came in white/clear fuzz, i've colored it so that I could actually see it and not feel like it wasn't growing at ll. So many of your posts give me hope that sometime this summer my male pattern baldness with fade to real hair.. any suggestions
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: May 8, 2015 05:51PM CandynKiss wrote: I have been so down the last few days, beautiful weather, and i i just hate not having any hair... its now almost 11 weeks since last chemo .. am i being too impatient?
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: May 12, 2015 08:23PM CandynKiss wrote: BosumBlues, I'm so sorry to hear that you are going thru more issues with your hair and with the drugs. It does seem that the more I try to control something the less I can.... I don't know if I will ever be my old self, only hoping i can be happy with the new self
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: May 8, 2015 08:37PM CandynKiss wrote: Hi Toby, yes, i have some fuzz, and some male pattern baldness going on, the fuzz is mostly around my ears. I was on A/C for four sessions, and then on Taxotere for four sessions, last one was on February 24... maybe it seems so long ago because it was literally freezing out then, and it was 90 here today.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: May 10, 2015 03:54PM CandynKiss wrote: Thanks Toby, I am also using woman's Rogaine and taking biotin (i started the biotin while on Taxotere since my nails started to fall off) it has helped my nails, they are growing really fast. I am trying to be patient, i laugh at myself on occasion, it took 10 days from when i got my first AC for the hair to fall out completely, i want it to grow back that fast. Today I did the Race for the Cure in Pittsburgh and was able to talk to a few women about our experiences, and do feel a little better about my hair. I know its minor, but it seems to be a focus point for me. Like if my hair is growing back, I really am better..
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
